heroSection.headline: Get Stuff Done With ChoreChamp
heroSection.subHeadline: Book, Relax, Achieve – ChoreChamp makes home care happen.

features.convenienceDesc: Find reliable service providers for all your household tasks with just a few clicks.
features.qualityWorkDesc: Our vetted professionals deliver top-notch results, ensuring your satisfaction every time.
features.affordabilityDesc: Get competitive bids from skilled contractors and choose the best offer that fits your budget.
